title.en: Senpai ga Uzai Kouhai no Hanashi

altTitles.en: A Story About a Senior Who Annoys His Junior
A Story About a Senpai Who Annoys His Kouhai

altTitles.ja-ro: Senpai ga Urusai Kouhai no Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 先輩がうざい後輩の話

description.en:
Futaba Igarashi is a diminutive office lady who finds that her towering and boisterous work senpai Harumi Takeda always gets in her hair, but he always has her back, he always keeps her company, and she starts noticing that her heart is slowly veering towards him…  
  
1st place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga (2018)

description.ja:
ちょっぴりガサツだけど面倒見のいい先輩・武田と、そんな彼に素直になれない（？）後輩・五十嵐。

今日も五十嵐は武田をうざいと思いつつ、本当はまんざらでもなかったりやっぱり本当にうざいときもあったりと自覚のない二人の微妙な距離感にもだえちゃうことまちがいなし！
description.uk: Іґараші - працьовита молода офісна жінка. Такеда - семпай з роботи, нервує її постійно - і все ж вона стає все ближче до нього. Кожен день наповнений комічними невдачами та романтичними моментами, коли Іґараші намагається збалансувати роботу, життя та кохання.
description.pt-br: Igarashi é uma jovem esforçada que trabalha em um escritório. Takeda, o senpai acima dela no trabalho, a irrita constantemente - e ainda assim ela se encontra cada vez mais próxima dele. Todos os dias são repletos de contratempos cômicos e momentos românticos enquanto Igarashi tenta equilibrar trabalho, vida e amor.

description.en: Sakuma, a teacher at an all-girls school, sees his wife in the red-light district cheating on him one day. In response, he runs away and decides to tour Japan, going wherever his heart may lead him. He finally reaches Odawara and meets a young girl, that looks like the one he always sees in his dreams. He barely manages to stop himself from crossing the line with the girl, and he eventually returns to his normal life, having discovered that his wife's alleged cheating was all a misunderstanding. But then...
description.pt-br: Sakuma, um professor em uma escola só para meninas, vê sua esposa no distrito de prostituição o traindo. Em resposta, ele foge e decide fazer uma turnê pelo Japão, indo aonde seu coração o levar. Ele finalmente chega a Odawara e conhece uma jovem, que se parece com a que ele sempre vê em seus sonhos. Ele mal consegue se impedir de cruzar a linha com a garota e, eventualmente, retorna à sua vida normal, ao descobrir que a suposta traição de sua esposa foi um mal-entendido. Mas então...

title.en: I'm in Love with the Villainess

altTitles.zh: 我的首推是恶役大小姐

altTitles.zh-hk: 我的首推是惡役大小姐

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ de shǒutuī shì è yì dà xiǎojiě

altTitles.th: ทำไงดีเกมนี้นางร้ายน่ารัก

altTitles.ja-ro: Watashi no Oshi wa Akuyaku Reijou.

altTitles.es-la: Mi Oshi Es Una Villa Noble

description.de:
Oohashi Rei - eigentlich eine ganz normale Büroangestellte - wacht eines Tages im Körper der Protagonistin ihres absoluten Lieblingsspiels "Revolution" auf. Eigentlich geht es in dem Spiel darum, mit einem von drei absolut wundervollen Prinzen zusammenzukommen. Ein klassisches Otome-Game, und wenn es nach Rei geht, auch das mit Abstand beste.  
Ihr Hauptinteresse lag dabei jedoch nicht etwa an einem der männlichen Charaktere, sondern an Claire François, der Antagonistin des Spiels.

Wird Rei es schaffen, eine romantische Beziehung zu ihr aufzubauen? Wie werden die eigentlichen Stars des Spiels, die drei Prinzen, auf diese Situation reagieren?  
Und was hält Claire überhaupt davon?
description.en:
Ordinary office worker Oohashi Rei wakes up in the body of the protagonist of her favourite otome game, *Revolution*. To her delight, the first person to greet her is also her favourite character, Claire François – the main antagonist of the story!

Now, Rei is determined to romance Claire instead of the game’s male leads. But how will her villainous lady love react to this new courtship?!
description.fr:
Rei Ôhashi, une simple employée de bureau d’une petite entreprise, se retrouve soudainement dans le corps de l’héroïne de son jeu vidéo de drague préféré, Revolution.
Maintenant sous le nom de Rae Taylor, elle est prête à accomplir son objectif.
Passer du bon temps avec les princes du jeu ? Non.
Son cœur appartient à la méchante de l’histoire, Claire François.
Bien décidée à la chérir et à rester à ses côtés, sa nouvelle vie commence dans un monde empreint de magie !
description.id: Seorang pegawai kantor biasa, Oohashi Rei, bereinkarnasi sebagai seorang Heroine bernama Rei Taylor di Game Otome favoritnya, "Revolution". Kebetulan lagi, orang pertama yang menyambutnya adalah karakter favoritnya, Claire Francois- antagonis dari cerita ini! Kini Rei bertekad untuk membangun hubungan romantis dengan Claire, bukan dengan pemeran utama pria. Lantas, bagaimanakah gadis jahat yang dia cintai akan bereaksi terhadap kemesraan baru ini?!
description.it:
La normale impiegata Oohashi Rei si sveglia nel corpo della protagonista del suo gioco otome preferito, Revolution. Per la sua gioia, la prima persona che incontra è anche il suo personaggio preferito, Claire François, l'antagonista principale della storia! Ora Rei è determinata a perseguire una storia d'amore con Claire piuttosto che con gli interessi amorosi maschili. Ma come reagirà la sua amata antagonista a questo nuovo corteggiamento?!
L'anime debutterà ad ottobre 2023!
Annunciato il manga ufficiale italiano!
description.ja: 乙女ゲーム『Revolution』の世界に、ヒロインのレイ＝テイラーとして転生した社畜OL・大橋零。そんな彼女の推しは攻略対象の王子たち…ではなく、悪役令嬢・クレア＝フランソワだった!　前世でゲームをやりこんでいたレイは、その知識と愛で、クレアとお近づきになることができるのか？
description.es-la: Oohashi Rei, una trabajadora de oficina ordinaria se despierta en el cuerpo de la protagonista de su juego otome favorito, "Revolution". Para su deleite, la primera persona en saludarla es también su personaje favorito, Claire Francois, ¡la principal antagonista de la historia! Ahora, Rei está decidida a enamorarse de Claire en lugar de los protagonistas masculinos del juego. ¿Pero cómo reaccionará la villana ante este nuevo cortejo?

title.en: Tsuihou Bokensha no Yarinaoshi ~Yousei-kai de Kitae Naoshite Jibun no Ibasho wo Tsukuru~

altTitles.ja: 追放冒険者のやりなおし　～妖精界で鍛えなおして自分の居場所をつくる～
Tsuihou Bokensha no Yarinaoshi ~Yousei-kai de Kitae Naoshite Jibun no Ibasho wo Tsukuru~

altTitles.en: Outcast Adventurer's Second Chance ~Training in the Fairy World to Forge a Place to Belong~

description.en:
"Glen, your bad reputation is dragging the party down. We're kicking you out today."

A party of adventurers formed from childhood friends. The day after a promotion exam, Glen was summoned to the guild and expelled by the party leader. The reason given was the "bad rumors" that followed Glen. The rumors had no basis, but Glen was already considering leaving the party, so he accepted the outcome and left the party.

Alone, he returned to his hometown for the first time in a long while to catch up.

"Glen, leave this place."

What awaited him there were the people who raised him believing in the bad rumors. 

"If you think I'm like that, then I'll be like that!", he shouted as he disappeared into the forest. 

This is a story about an adventurer trying to regain the things he has lost. Those who abandoned him will wallow in grief, while he moves forward with his new companions.

Has anyone ever made fun of your dream?  
  
Magic is something everyone in this world desires. Dawn Hill, with absolutely no experience in magic, has been accepted to the best magic school in Wuzhou. The only problem is she's the "worst student" they've ever seen. Faced with ridicule, rejection, and contempt, can the stubborn little witch fight back?

altTitles.en: Ah, Hang on a Little Longer, My Lord

altTitles.ja: お待ちください、領主様！

altTitles.es: Ah, por favor sea paciente, ¡mi señor!

description.en:
Rose is the ruler of the dominion of ‘White’, a small and poor land. She was getting along with her citizens and living a quaint, favorable life until foreign migrants kept increasing and she got involved in some odd situations?! The lively, entertaining, romance, fantasy story of a super OP ruler Rose and Yggdrasil, the grand sorcerer who wants to hide her away and protect her!

---
When the Kingdom of White was conquered 500 years ago, the king and his subjects were exiled to a small tract of wasteland covered in ice. There they endured cold and hunger, relying on the magic of Archmage Yggdrasil to build the world’s smallest self-governing territory. As the last heir to her family, Rose now rules over this land as its lord. Rescuing former citizens who have fallen prey to trafficking abroad, she pours her heart and soul into making them thrive at home. But first things first, she must fill up the treasury to fund this mission! The business-savvy lord invites dragons, dwarfs, and elves to join in the effort, turning White into a haven for all races. Yggdrasil couldn’t be prouder of this utopia in the making, but will Lord Rose ever get to leave her money troubles behind?

---

description.ko:
작고 가난한 영지 ‘화이트’의 영주, 로즈.
영주민들과 오순도순 잘 먹고 잘살고 싶었는데, 갑자기 이종족 이주민이 늘고 자꾸 사건에 휘말린다?! 
막강 능력 영주님 ‘로즈’와 그녀를 영지에 몰래몰래 숨겨 놓고 보호하고픈 스승, ‘대마법사 이그드라실’의 유쾌 발랄 로맨스 판타지!

description.tr:
Rose, küçük ve fakir bir bölge olan White'ın hükümdarıdır. Göçmenlerin artmasına
ve garip olaylara dahil oluncaya kadar halkıyla iyi anlaşıyor ve hoş, güzel bir hayat yaşıyordu.
Güçlü ve yetenekli hükümdar Rose ve onu gizleyip korumak isteyen Usta Sihirbaz Yggdrasil'in heyecanlı,
eğlenceli, aşk ve fantazi hikayesi!
description.zh:
活泼领主X超强大魔法师！
充满惊喜的领地生活开始！
露丝·白是贫寒的白领地领主，她的身边有大魔法师伊格·德拉希尔辅佐。身为白的老师，他担任着领地的各种职务。为了领地的繁荣露丝不断尝试各种冒险，然而异族渐渐踏入领地，也因此带来各种问题...乐天女领主该如果解决迎面而来的难题呢？

狹小又貧脊的「白色領地」領主——羅茲，夢想與領地居民一起和睦生活，卻因為異族移民增加，不斷捲入各種事件。 具有強大力量的領主羅茲，與在背後默默守護領地與羅茲的師傅——大魔法師 伊克德雷瑟將會展開什麼歡樂的浪漫奇幻故事？

description.en:
Park Han-jun, once called a legend, was frustrated because he had nothing to lose anymore is given a huge amount of money.

An eye for an eye. An eye for a tooth! I’ll make you pay for what I’ve gone through!

As his rage explodes, he’ll get his sweet revenge and make them pay as much as they deserve!

title.en: Tensei Shitara Hime Datta node Dansou Joshi Kiwamete Saikyou Mahou Tsukai Mezasuwa

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Shitara Hime Datta node Dansou Joshi Kiwamete Saikyou Mahou Tsukai Mezasuwa

altTitles.ja: 転生したら姫だったので男装女子極めて最強魔法使い目指すわ

altTitles.en: I Was Reincarnated as a Princess, so I’m Going to Become the Strongest Wizard in the World!

description.en:
Ikuto, an ordinary high school boy, is reincarnated as Isabella, a sheltered princess in a world of magic?!
Although he is happy to be able to use magic, Ikuto's ambitions are crushed when he discovers that, in this world, women are not allowed to use magic.
Still, Ikuto is not ready to give up, and at the age of 16, he decides to leave the castle and embark on a journey to learn magic...?!
A new sensation about a princess disguised as a man (while inwardly a high school boy) and a handsome wizard with special circumstances!

(Source: Hakusensha, translated via DeepL)

title.en: Tonari no Neko to Koi Shirazu

altTitles.ja: となりの猫と恋知らず

altTitles.en: The Feline Neighbor and the Unversed-in-Love

description.en: Minato Seno, who has always been very shy since he was young, struggled to make friends during his first few days of high school. He also never got a glimpse of his classmate Nekozane-san's face, as she was always asleep at the desk next to him. However, one day after school, a chance encounter revealed a side of Nekozane-san that was completely different from the one Minato knew in the classroom.

title.en: A Village Protected by a Dragon

altTitles.en: The Village protected by a dragon

altTitles.es-la: Uma Vila Protegida Por Um Dragão

altTitles.zh: You Long Shou Hu De Xiao Zhen

description.en: Hua Dai found herself with an illness - whenever she touches something she wants/likes, her hands will get stuck to it until she buys it. Due to this illness, she is in great debt. Without choice, she decided to go back to her grandpa's house with this secret key her grandpa gave her in search of treasure, hoping to pay off her debts. As Hua Dai arrived at Bai Lin Village, she found a girl named "Long" who claimed to be a disciple of her grandpa. With this, Hua Dai started living with this strange girl…

'Sonidor', a dream artisan who enters into other people's dreams through physical contact and grants wishes that could not be fulfilled in reality. One day, the emperor suddenly arrives at the house and asks to wake up the crown prince who has fallen into eternal sleep. "I want you to wake him up."

Sonidor enters the dream of 'Marmel', the crown prince who is praised by everyone for his gentle nature and beautiful appearance, but somehow Marmel's dream is gloomy and desolate. “You were just going to kill me?!” 

According to the taste of the prince who hates people, Sonidor turns into various animals and finds the reason why Marmel fell asleep one by one, and Marmel gradually opens his heart to Sonidor... "Your Highness, do you believe me?" Will Sonidor be able to wake Marmel from his eternal sleep?
description.pl: "Będę trzymać jego ręce, by obudzić go z wiecznego snu"  Sodinor, ekspert do spraw snów, ma umiejętność spełnienia marzeń nawet w świecie snów. Na rozkaz cesarza została wprowadzona do snu księcia Marmella, który nie mógł się obudzić.  Jednak w snach księcia, który znany jest ze swojej dobroci i łagodności, jest coś bardzo dziwnego. Jego kraina marzeń jest opuszona i bezbarwna.   Sonidor infiltrując sny Marmella pod postacią uroczego zwierzątka udaje się znaleźć powód jego długiego letargu...  Czy Marmell obudzi się w końcu z wiecznego snu?

altTitles.ja: 水のともだちカッパーマン

description.en: Kawataro, half human, half kappa, lives as a human, because his father, a kappa, wished so. Kawataro travels to find his mother who disappeared when he was young. On his trip, he encounters various youkai.

title.en: Oswald the Overman in the Lesser Planes of Hell

description.en: An idiot wakes up in hell, and goes on a journey to reclaim their life.

Follow Ebizou, a self-proclaimed genius, in his attempts to murder the old pawn-broker lady who called him a retard.  
  
This manga is a parody of Fyodor Dostoyevsky's novel of the same name.

description.cs:
Veľká rodina Lombardi bola kedysi na vrchole impéria. Po smrti jej patriarchu sa osud rodiny a Firentie - nemanželskej dcéry, sa rúca do záhuby rukami jej neužitočných a krutých bratrancov. Jej otec zomrel, príbuzní ju vyhodili na ulicu a významná rodina, na ktorú bola taká hrdá, bola úplne zničená... Keď sa však prevtelí do svojho sedemročného ja, bude sa snažiť ochrániť česť rodiny, získať si priazeň starého otca Lulaca a zabrániť smrti vlastného otca. V tomto živote pre ňu existuje len jeden spôsob, ako zvíťaziť: stať sa hlavou ich mocného rodu.

---

description.en:
I've reincarnated as Firentia Lombardy, the illegitimate daughter of the wealthiest and most influential family in the Empire. I thought I was all set to have a comfortable and luxurious life… but it wasn't long before my beloved father died, my relatives kicked me out, and our family went bankrupt!!

To add insult to injury, I was hit by a carriage one day when I drank (a bit too much) booze to drown my sorrows… but my despair was only temporary. When I opened my eyes, I found that I'd traveled back in time to when I was 7 years old!

I was surprised to see my father again in the flesh. But as if that wasn't already shocking enough, the 2nd prince, our family's once sworn enemy, was now following me around like a dog!

Now that I've been given a second chance at life, I'll take things into my own hands and claim both the 2nd prince and my family for myself!

---
**Links:**
* Alternative Official English - [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/i-shall-master-this-family/info)
description.fr:
Florentia s'est réincarnée comme l'enfant illégitime de la famille la plus riche de l'empire, même si elle n'était pas de sang pure elle pensait que tout irait bien, son père était gentil avec elle, mais à la mort de ce dernier sa famille l'a abandonnée et elle s'est retrouvée seule, puis soudainement le trou noir.

Elle se souvient d'avoir un peu bu puis avoir ressenti un violent coup sur la tête et maintenant elle est de retour dans son corps de 7 ans! L'occasion de tout changer et de devenir même en étant illégitime la cheffe de la famille!

---
La grande famille Lombardi était autrefois au sommet de l’Empire. Après la mort de son patriarche, le sort de la famille et celui de Firentia, née d’un Lombardi et d’un paysan, tombent en ruine aux mains de ses cousins inutiles et cruels. Mais lorsqu’elle se réincarne à l’âge de ses sept ans, elle fera tout pour protéger l’honneur de la famille, gagner les faveurs de son grand-père Lulac et, empêcher la mort de son père. Dans cette vie, il n’y a qu’un seul moyen pour elle de gagner: devenir la cheffe de leur puissante famille.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%B4%EB%B2%88-%EC%83%9D%EC%9D%80-%EA%B0%80%EC%A3%BC%EA%B0%80-%EB%90%98%EA%B2%A0%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2473), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/56566288)

description.id:
Aku pikir aku adalah putri bangsawan yang hidupnya bergelimang harta dan kebahagiaan, tapi ternyata aku ini anak berdarah campuran bangsawan dan rakyat biasa yang keberadaannya tidak dianggap dalam keluargaku sendiri. Ibuku sudah tiada dan tidak ada yang menyayangiku kecuali ayahku sendiri. Setelah bekerja keras mengabdikan diri untuk keluarga ini, siapa sangka aku malah diusir dan berakhir mati tertabrak kereta kuda. Ketika terbangun lagi aku bereinkarnasi untuk kedua kalinya di tubuh yang sama.

description.ja:
今度こそ守れるんじゃないかな？ ランブル帝国随一の家門、ロンバルディを！ 交通事故で死んだ後ロンバルディ家の婚外子として転生したフィレンティア。 だが…彼女を待ち受けていたのは愛する父の死とロンバルディ家の滅亡だった。 家門の滅亡を知った日に彼女は酒を飲んで馬車に轢かれてしまうのだが、目を覚ますと7歳の自分に戻っていた。 今度こそ父と家門を守り抜くと決めたフィレンティア。 彼女を待ち構える試練とは一体何なのか… 当主になると決めた彼女の挑戦が始まるーー！

description.ko:
“한번 해 보자, 내가 가주가 되는 거야.”
환생에 회귀까지, 인생 3회차 피렌티아의 가주 되기 프로젝트!

제국 제일가는 명문가 롬바르디가의 막내 손녀 ‘피렌티아’. 그녀는 똑똑하고 능력 있지만 사생아로 태어났다는 이유로 친척들에게 온갖 수모를 당하고, 결국 가문에서 쫓겨나고 만다. 이후 피렌티아는 더 이상 가문 일에 참여할 수 없게 되고, 그저 무능력한 큰아버지의 손에 롬바르디가가 망해가는 것을 지켜볼 수밖에 없었다. 화가 나 술을 진탕 마신 어느 날, 피렌티아는 마차 사고를 당해 죽음을 맞이하는데…. 그러나 어떻게 된 일인지 눈을 떠 보니 거울에 비친 것은 일곱 살 때의 모습?! 전생의 기억을 가지고 회귀한 피렌티아는 다시 찾은 생에서는 롬바르디가의 멸문을 막기 위해 스스로 가주가 되기로 결심하는데…!

---

เมื่อเธอมาเกิดใหม่ในร่างของฟีเรนเทีย ลอมบาร์เดีย บุตรีแห่งตระกูลลอมบาร์เดีย หลังปู่ของเธอเสียไปเธอก็ถูกไล่ออกจากตระกูลและเพียงไม่นานตระกูลได้ล่มสลาย ฟีเรนเทียประสบอุบัติเหตุเสียชีวิตอีกครั้ง และย้อนกลับมาตอนอายุ 7 ขวบ ฟีเรนเทียที่ล่วงรู้อนาคตที่กำลังจะเกิดขึ้นทุกอย่างจึงพยายามแก้ไขทุกอย่างให้ดีขึ้น และมุ่งสู่เส้นทางการขึ้นเป็นผู้นำตระกูล...

description.uk:
"...спробуймо. Я очолю цю родину." Фірентія переродилася позашлюбною дитиною аристократа Ломбарді - наймогутнішої родини в імперії. Ба більше, історія цього роду тотожна історії держави Лембру! Ломбарді, знамениті своїми статками, обросли зв'язками та стали надійними покровителями для талановитих людей. Здавалось, що на Фірентію чекає світле майбутнє... Але її батько помер, а родичі, які прогнали дівчину, розвалили впливовий дім! Трохи (ні) випивши, вона потрапила під екіпаж на шляху додому. "Це занадто..." Фірентія знову розплющила очі семирічною дівчинкою. Тепер вона може врятувати татка і свою родину? А другий принц бігає за нею, немов відданий пес? Гаразд, тоді другий принц і дім Ломбарді належать їй!

description.vi:
Gia đình vĩ đại Lombardy, đã một thời đứng đầu đế quốc. Sau cái chết của chủ gia đình, số phận của gia đình và của cả Firentia, sinh ra từ một Lombardy và thường dân, rơi vào tay những anh em họ độc ác và vô dụng của cô ấy. Nhưng khi Firentia quay về cơ thể của mình vào năm 7 tuổi, cô ấy sẽ làm hết sức để bảo vệ danh dự của gia đình, lấy lòng người ông nội Lulac, và ngăn chặn cái chết của cha mình. Trong lần này, chỉ có một đường để Firentia thắng: trở thành mẫu hệ của gia đình vĩ đại này.

意外穿成为了帝国最声名鼎盛的第一家族的私生女。虽然蒂亚头脑出众，也积累了大量的实战经验，但最终在爷爷去世后被叔叔扫地出门，而无能的叔叔很快便败光了家族的产业…… 意外死亡后，又一次重新回了小时候——这一世，蒂亚决定成为家主，重新让家族站上帝国巅峰！

description.pt-br:
Florentia reencarnou como filha ilegítima da família mais rica do império. Ela pensou que tudo iria bem no futuro. Mas seu pai havia falecido, seus parentes a deixaram na porta, e a família honrada de que ela tanto se orgulhava estava completamente arruinada…. Mas isso é real? Ela bebeu um pouco (muito) e foi atropelada por uma carruagem, Quando ela abriu os olhos novamente, ela tinha sete anos? Além disso, o Segundo Príncipe, que era inimigo de sua família em sua vida anterior, está seguindo-a como um cachorro!

description.en:
**"Please sell me. I will become the most expensive lady in Sant'nar"**

Tired of the troubles brought about by his political marriage, debauchee Cesare coincidentally enters into an unusual  contract Adel, a shoeshiner from the slums.

The deadline is three months.

Expecting this to be his liberation from the tedious strategic marriage, Cesare finds himself becoming increasingly concerned about Adel, who behaves unlike any woman he has ever known...

"In the first place, didn't you bring me here to get me engaged to Sir Ezra?"
"That's right."

Cesare replied obediently for a moment before bursting into a sharp laugh.

"But why do I feel so disgusted?"
When a police officer is posted to a remote village in the countryside, little does he realize he's encroaching on a community of cannibals…
description.ru:
Полицейский Дайго Агава вместе с семьёй переезжает в горную деревушку под названием Цветочная. Жители деревни горячо принимают семью Дайго.
Однажды в лесу находят труп старушки. После этого происшествия Дайго постепенно начинает осознавать все происходящие вокруг странности и приходит к мысли, что в этой деревне едят людей. Начинают происходить очень странные инциденты, атмосфера отчуждения наполняет деревню. Сможет ли обычный полицейский разгадать все ужасные тайны, которая таит в себе эта деревня и, что важнее, сможет ли он остаться в живых?

title.en: The Duke of Death and His Maid

altTitles.fr: Le duc de la Mort et sa gouvernante obscure

altTitles.ru: Смертоносный герцог и его черная горничная

altTitles.ar: النبيل الشاب حاصد الأرواح و خادمته السوداء

altTitles.ja: 死神坊ちゃんと黒メイド

altTitles.en: The Duke of Death and His Black Maid

description.en:
In a large mansion lives a boy, an aristocrat who was cursed by the witch to "let everything he touches die." With him is his maid Alice, who besides serving him, likes to tease him. The boy who is interested in her doesn't mind the teasing, but not being able to touch her is painful!  
  
If they are unable to hold hands, how will their love ever bloom?
description.tr: Hikâye büyük bir malikanede yaşayan kaderi bir cadı tarafından mühürlenen bir çocuk ve onunla beraber yaşayan hizmetçi Alice hakkında; çocuk dokunduğu her şeyi ölüme sürüklerken; Alice ile hiç el ele tutuşamayacak olmalarına rağmen yaşanan inişli çıkışlı bir aşk.

description.en: Winner of the 105th Newcomer Manga Award.

title.en: A Chinese Fantasy: Law of the Fox

altTitles.ja-ro: 狐の掟 中国幻想選

description.en: When a man saves a fox, the last thing he expects is for her to return to him a beautiful maiden, but gratitude is powerful and so is the law of the fox. When it comes to finding a love match, don't rule out pairing with a tiger, wolf or bear! This collection of seven fantasy short stories is about finding love in the strangest of places.
description.pt-br: Quando um homem salva uma raposa, a última coisa que espera é que ela volte para ele como uma bela donzela, mas a gratidão é poderosa e a lei da raposa também. Quando se trata de encontrar um par amoroso, não descarte o emparelhamento com um tigre, lobo ou urso! Esta coleção de sete contos de fantasia trata de encontrar o amor nos lugares mais estranhos.

title.en: Kono Fukushuu ni Gyaru wa Iranai

altTitles.ja: この復讐にギャルはいらない

description.en:
Videogames x Showa Culture x Glamour! A voluptuous and fascinating book for those that enjoy the Showa Era and playing video games! A large collection of stories, published in Harta by Benitsubaki's author, Takahashi Hirona, all in one volume!

Two glamorous folk tales, including "Glamorous-suteyama", a glamorous rearrangement of the Ubasuteyama legend!
When a witch fostering a planet sprays it with some water, torrential rains begin to pour from above in "My first planet"
"Shiramari" is a super idol whose singing voice makes people so happy they could die!
And of course, the series of 16 shorts "It's okay to play games", the antithesis of being given a cold look while you're playing video games!

Full of bright, fantastical ideas, all these gems from Harta's new wave, Takahashi Hirona, in a single volume!

altTitles.th: มือใหม่หัดรัก

description.en: One day, when I was making school supplies in the art room, a very scary-looking girl was staring at me...!? Crafts girl vs. art boy romantic comedy!!
description.ru: В один прекрасный день Ибуки Синтаро поручили сделать ящик для предложений только потому, что он состоит в художественном кружке. Пока он работал с непривычными для него инструментами, он заметил на себе сверлящий взгляд устрашающей девчонки. Неожиданно она забирает у него пилу и энергичными движениями начинает резать доску! Так начинаются отношения между мальчишкой-художником и девчонкой-мастерицей!
description.th: “ในวันหนึ่ง ขณะที่กำลังทำงานอุปกรณ์ในห้องศิลปะ มีเด็กสาวที่มีหน้าตาน่ากลัวกำลังเฝ้ามองมาที่ผม...!?” เรื่องราวความรักคอมเมดี้ระหว่างสาวช่างฝีมือกับหนุ่มสายศิลป์!?
description.pt-br:
Um dia, quando eu estava fazendo material escolar na sala de arte, uma garota muito assustadora estava olhando para mim...!? 

Menina do artesanato vs. garoto da arte comédia romântica!!

description.en:
After killing the male lead, the originally innocent girl transformed into a villainess.
Just as she was about to enjoy her newfound freedom, she died a violent death and returned back to the start of the game.
Having carried over with her all the skills she acquired in her previous "playthrough", she was prepared to kill the male lead again; however, the current circumstances seem a bit... strange?
description.ru:
Убив главного героя, девушка становится монстром в глазах других, но, собираясь насладиться свободой, трагично погибает и оказывается в начале игры. Сохранив знания и навыки из прошлой жизни, она собирается повторить своё убийство, однако происходящее кажется немного… странным.
«Да кто же ты такой?!»
description.zh: 杀死男主角后，原小白花女二黑化成了女魔头，正当她快意江湖的时候却暴毙回到游戏的开头。继承了上周目所有能力的她准备先下手为强再次杀死男主，只是现在的情况好像有点……意外？ “不对，你到底谁啊——？！”

altTitles.pl: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Część 9 - The JoJoLands

altTitles.fr: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Partie 9 - The JOJOLands

altTitles.pt-br: A Estranha Aventura de JoJo, Parte 9: As JoJoLândias

altTitles.it: Le Bizzarre Avventure di JoJo: Le JOJOLands

description.en:
The ninth story arc of Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure. 

O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand…

This is a story of a young boy and his quest to become rich.
description.hu:
Ez a Jojo's Bizarre Adventure kilencedik történetíve.

O'ahu, napjainkban. Dua Lipa a trendi előadó és a COVID még mindig a fő gond. Ezen a szigeten él egy 15 éves srác, Jodio Joestar. Bátyával és édesanyjával él, dílerként dolgozik és bizonyos illegális anyagokat árul. Egy nap, a főnöke mutat neki egy kiválló fogást: egy japán személy Hawaiira érkezett egy hat millió dollárt érő gyémánttal. Normális esetben lehetetlen lenne ellopni, de akinek standje van...

Ez egy fiatal fiú és az ő küldetésének a története, hogy gazdag legyen.
description.it: O'ahu, oggi. Dua Lipa è la musicista di tendenza e il COVID è ancora una delle principali preoccupazioni. Su quest'isola vive un ragazzo di 15 anni di nome Jodio Joestar. Vive con il fratello e la madre e fa lo spacciatore di alcune sostanze illegali. Un giorno, il suo datore di lavoro arriva e gli mostra un'eccellente scoperta: un giapponese è sbarcato alle Hawaii con un diamante del valore di oltre sei milioni di dollari. Normalmente sarebbe impossibile da rubare, ma per qualcuno con una posizione... Questa è la storia di un ragazzo e della sua ricerca della ricchezza.
description.uk:
Дев’ята сюжетна арка «Неймовірних пригод Джоджо». Оаху, теперішній час. Дуа Ліпа – популярна музикантка, а COVID-19 досі викликає серйозне занепокоєння. На цьому острові мешкає 15-річний хлопчик на ім'я Джодіо Джостар. Живе з братом і матір'ю, торгує певними забороненими речовинами. Одного разу його бос прийшов до нього і показав неймовірну знахідку: японець висадився на Гаваях з діамантом вартістю понад шість мільйонів доларів! Зазвичай, вкрасти таку коштовність було б неможливо, але для того, хто має стенд… 
Це історія про молодого хлопця та його прагнення розбагатіти.
description.es-la: Cierto japonés ingresó a la isla de Hawái con un diamante de valor de 6 millones de dólares. En la isla de Oahu vive un chico llamado Jodio Joestar, cuya meta es arrebatar el diamante de las manos de esa persona. Junto a sus asociados, irán a la quinta de esa persona. Sin embargo, ¿Qué misterios les esperan?

description.en:
A new Animate is opening up, and things are looking tight without the manager. Unfortunately, he won't make it - one young man, Anizawa, has been bestowed his position in his stead! Learn alongside Anizawa the ins-and-outs of running an Animate, along with various anime production merch and events.

A work meant to promote the anime goods shop Animate, packed with Shimamoto's nekketsu (hot-blooded) flavor. Though serialized in different magazines, it is printed under Studio DNA's (now Ichijinsha) Comic Zero Sum imprint.
  
Link:  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=358) (OVA)

Ototsugu Hasumi is a popular novelist, who is constantly rumored to have a difficult personality and looks like a rock star. One day he unexpectedly picks up a boy named Naruaki.
His editor's schemes, stalker, Naruaki's past, and Hasumi's past intersect...

When playing a virtual reality game called Cang Lan, Xiao Wan gets pushed off a cliff. She ends up in another game world. What will happen to Xiao Wan?

---
**Contents:** 147 (or 410 split chapter parts) (S1) + >197 (S2) = >344 chapters
- **Season 1:** vol. 1 ch. 1-147 (1-147)
- **Season 2:** vol. 2 ch. 1-197+ (148-344+) (ongoing)

**Note:** season 1 chapter 1-114 is in single page format. Starting with season 1 chapter 115, the page format switches to long strip.

Amelia, a kingdom of war and magic led by Queen Amelia, monopolizes the extraordinary power of "magic" and repeatedly invades other countries in a time of war. Even in the prosperous "small country Campusfellow", known for its farms and blacksmiths, the flames of war are approaching. 

If things go on like this, Campus Fellows will perish.

For the sake of the country's survival , Lord "Vad Grace" decides to take a devious measure by recruiting into his ranks a group of vicious "Witches" who are known as "disasters", who have left behind numerous terrifying tales. 

Raised as an assassin, "Black Hound," who has been trained in all kinds of assassination techniques, the boy throws himself into the impossible tasks to protect his country and lord.

A magnificent dark fantasy epic, skillfully woven by the genius Kamitsuki Rainy and beautifully illustrated by Tsukahara Minori, the artist behind 'Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu: Hyouketsu no Kizuna,' proudly begins!

description.en: Masatora Akutsu has just transferred into class in Japan from a long way away - all the way from Hell, to be exact. Akutsu is a demon who's come to Earth to find someone who can motivate the forces of Hell to fight back against the invading Heavenly army. He immediately sets his sights on one of his classmates, the kind and beautiful Lily Amane, but ends up in way over his head when it turns out Lily has some secrets of her own!
description.ja: 堕落した悪魔たちにやる気を出させるため悪魔たちのアイドルとなる人間を捜しに人間界に降りてきた阿久津雅虎。彼は早くもアイドル候補・天音リリーを見つけ勧誘する。しかし、リリーの正体は阿久津たち悪魔の天敵の「天使」で!? 自らの身と仲間を守るためリリーを堕天させんとする阿久津と野望のため阿久津の更正を決意する
description.pt: Masatora Akutsu acabou de ser transferido para uma turma ni Japão de muito muito longe - todo o caminho desde o Inferno, para ser exato. Akutsu é um demônio que veio à Terra para encontrar alguém que possa motivar as forças do Inferno a contra atacar o exército invasor do Paraíso. Ele imediatamente coloca os olhos em um dos seus colegas, a gentil e bonita Lily Amane, mas acaba sendo muito para ele aguentar quando acaba descobrindo que a Lily tem alguns segredos dela mesmo!
description.pt-br: Masatora Akutsu acabou de ser transferido para uma turma ni Japão de muito muito longe -todo o caminho desde o Infernio, para ser exato. Akutsu é um demônio que veio à Terra para encontrar alguém que possa motivar as forças do Inferno a contra atacar o exército invasor do Paraíso. Ele imediatamente coloca os olhos em um dos seus colegas, a gentil e bonita Lily Amane, mas acaba sendo muito para ele aguentar quando acaba descobrindo que a Lily tem alguns segredos dela mesmo!

title.en: Made in Abyss - Made from Fortunes (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ru: Созданный в Бездне - Созданный из Судеб

description.en:
The Abyss. A giant pit filled with gigantic cave system that goes down to extreme unknown depths, filled with wonderful and terrifying treasures and creatures never before seen. Only the bravest of the delvers are able to see what horrors truly lie in wait at the bottom. 
People are familiar with the great story of Made in Abyss, following a young orphaned cave raider, a mysterious amnesiac robot, and a tragic narehate. But, what if something went differently? What if one single decision changed these unfortunate childrens' story?

Up on Orth a pair of friends, Fyuo and Kwazan, a newly promoted red and blue whistle start experiencing a few strange things happening to them. Fyuo is having dreams of an unfamiliar figure and Kwazan decides to help him figure out the cause of these nightmares using notes she stole from another delver. But, what they find waiting for them only a few hundred meters down, will change their lives forever.
description.ru:
Бездна. Огромная яма, заполненная гигантской системой пещер, уходящих в неизведанные глубины, наполненные удивительными, ужасающими сокровищами и невиданными ранее существами. Только самые отважные из путешественников способны увидеть, какие ужасы поджидают их на дне.
Знакомая история Созданного в Бездне, которая рассказывает о юном сироте-искателе, таинственном роботе, страдающем амнезией и несчастной пустой. Но что, если бы что-то пошло по-другому? Что, если бы одно единственное решение изменило историю этих несчастных детей?

В Орте, пара друзей, Фьюо и Квазан, недавно получившие красный и синий свисток, начинают замечать странные вещи, происходящие с ними. Фьюо снится незнакомая фигура, и Квазан решает помочь ему выяснить причину этих кошмаров, используя записки, которые она украла у другого рейдера. Но то, что ждёт их всего в нескольких сотнях метров вниз, навсегда изменит их жизни.

description.en:
*Minami-ke* ("The Minami Household") is a manga following the three Minami sisters, Haruka, Kana, and Chiaki in their lives at home and school. It's a funny manga that depicts how these characters interact with each other and their classmates. Although they are ordinary girls, their ordinary adventures are told in an extraordinary manner.
**Source:** MangaUpdates

title.en: Maou Gun Saikyou no Majutsushi wa Ningen datta

altTitles.en: The Maou Army's Strongest Magician Was a Human

altTitles.ru: Самый сильный волшебник армии Мао оказался человеком

altTitles.ja: 魔王軍最強の魔術師は人間だった

altTitles.zh-hk: 魔王軍最強的魔術師是人類

description.en: “Maou Army’s strongest magician” I’m called. Ike, a demon capable of capturing a fort alone. Clearing away enemies with immense magic, he is without a doubt a monster held in awe by friend and foe. However he has a secret he can’t tell other demons. “I, actually am a human you know.” Using modern knowledge to keep his secret, he became treated as a great commander and the driving force of the Maou’s army.

Haruka Sakura wants nothing to do with weaklings—he's only interested in the strongest of the strong. He's just started at Furin High School, a school of degenerates known only for their brawling strength—strength they use to protect their town from anyone who wishes it ill. But Haruka's not interested in being a hero or being part of any sort of team—he just wants to fight his way to the top!
description.fr:
Haruka Sakura est le genre de lycéen qui fait passer la baston avant les révisions. Fraîchement débarqué en ville, c'est donc le sourire aux lèvres qu'il compte pousser les portes du lycée Fûrin, l'établissement scolaire au pire taux de délinquance du pays... Les intentions de Haruka sont claires : se mesurer aux meilleurs bagarreurs de ce bahut et devenir le meilleur de tous ! Mais entre-temps, il se retrouve mêlé à une altercation avec une bande de brutes dans un des quartiers de la ville, avant d'être sauvé in extremis par des élèves de son lycée. Haruka réalise alors à quel genre de phénomènes il risque d'avoir affaire...

Maison d'édition FR : Pika
description.pt-br: A Fûrin High School ganhou a pior reputação entre as escolas da região por ter a média mais baixa e os alunos mais rebeldes. E nela ingressa Haruka Sakura, um jovem que acaba de chegar na cidade, que busca ser o mais forte para poder proteger todos com quem se importa. Para atingir seu objetivo, porém, a primeira coisa que ele deve fazer é se juntar a uma gangue chamada Wind Breaker, que representa seu instituto e cujo objetivo é defender a cidade de outras gangues e bandidos. No entanto, para que eles o aceitem, ele terá que ganhar o respeito deles com os punhos!

description.en: An orphan named Aisya has been gifted the incredible power to make paintings that perform miracles just by using her blood. She and her best friend Loki have a wonderful time together, despite her deteriorating health. However, Loki realizes that he's nothing more than Aisya's drawing when he tries to save Aisya one night from an attacker. Aisya sends him on a quest to destroy her paintings and her curse, and to save the people changed by them, but can Loki look past his hatred of humans in order to carry out her wish?
description.es: La joven Aisya crece en un orfanato y cuando pinta con su propia sangre, sus cuadros se impregnan de un poder capaz de realizar milagros. Pero la oscuridad de los deseos humanos acaba manchando los cuadros que la niña creaba con la mejor de sus intenciones y pronto son llamados "los cuadros de la bruja". La niña encarga a su mejor amigo Loki, al que ha dado vida a través de sus cuadros, que vaya en busca de todas sus creaciones y las queme. ¡Así comienza el largo y peligroso viaje del joven Loki para cumplir su promesa!
description.ru: Сироте по имени Аиша была дарована невероятная сила - создавать картины, способные творить чудеса только благодаря использованию ее крови. Она и ее лучший друг Локи прекрасно проводят время вместе, несмотря на ухудшающееся здоровье девочки. Однако, пытаясь спасти подругу от ночного нападения, Локи понимает, что он не более, чем рисунок Аиши. Аиша дает ему задание уничтожить ее творения и проклятье, чтобы спасти связанных с ними людей, но сможет ли Локи отбросить свою ненависть к людям, чтобы исполнить ее желание?

description.en: Once on the All Saints' Day vampire Beru and ghost Aki, despite their very different personalities, started living together in a castle. Multiple obstacles and difficulties already waiting on their way. But when they'll know each other better, eventually they'll become the most important companions for one another.

Haejoon Goh, who ran from home, and Eunyung Baek, the problem child who lives in a tent.   
These two, who met under terrible circumstances, are forced to live together in an abandoned dormitory.   
This is a story of difficult growth between two people who hate both the dorm and each other.

The story begins when the gods call a convention to decide whether to let humanity live or die, and settle on destroying humanity. But a lone Valkyrie puts forward a suggestion to let the gods and humanity fight one last battle, as a last hope for humanity's continued survival. 13 gods will fight against 13 human champions in one-on-one battles to decide whether humanity lives or dies.

---
  - Alternative English Translation: [<comikey>](https://comikey.com/comics/record-of-ragnarok-manga/61/)
description.fa: ⁧⁧ داستان جایی شروع میشه که خدایان بحث این رو به میان میاورند که انسان‌ها زنده بمانند یا نابود شوند. ولی یک والکری به تنهایی بحث را به سمتی میکشاند که به انسان‌ها اجازه یک مبارزه در مقابل خدایان داده شود. و به این شکل کور سوی امید بشریت روشن باقی میماند. سیزده خدا، سیزده انسان، در مقابل هم قرار میگیرند تا سرنوشت بشریت را مشخص کنند
description.fr: Tous les mille ans, l'ensemble des dieux, tous panthéons réunis, se réunissent au Valhalla, le paradis des âmes, lors d'une assemblée présidée par Zeus, le dieu suprême grec, afin de décider du sort des humains. Or, cette année-là, il est décidé à la quasi-unanimité de détruire l'humanité. Mais la Valkyrie Brunehilde interrompt la conférence et propose aux dieux de se mesurer aux mortels lors du tournoi de Ragnarök, pour déterminer s'ils valent vraiment la peine d'êtres anéantis. Ce tournoi opposera 13 dieux issus de diverses mythologies à 13 puissants humains qui ont fait l'histoire. Si l'humanité remporte au moins sept des 13 duels, alors les dieux épargneront l'humanité.
description.id: - In Indonesian by [Akasha](http://www.mncgramedia.id/comics/comic_detail/akasha-record-of-ragnarok-01) as "Record of Ragnarok"
description.it: - In Italian by [Star Comics](https://www.starcomics.com/titoli-fumetti/record-of-ragnarok) as "Record of Ragnarok"
description.ru: История начинается c собрания богов, на котором они решают судьбу человечества: убить всех или оставить в живых, согласившись в никчёмности рода людского, боги выбирают первое... Но одна валькирия выдвигает предложение: позволить богам и человечеству сразиться в битве, в качестве последнего луча надежды людей. 13 богов сразятся против 13 чемпионов людей в битвах один на один, чтобы решить, будет ли человечество жить или сгинет в могуществе божественной силы.
description.tr: Hikâye, tanrıların insanlığın yaşamasına ya da ölmesine karar vermek için bir toplantı düzenlemesi ve insanlığı yok etmeye karar vermesiyle başlar. Ancak yalnız bir Valkyrie, insanlığın hayatta kalması için son bir umut olarak tanrıların ve insanlığın son bir savaşa girmesine izin verilmesi önerisini ortaya atar. 13 tanrı, insanlığın yaşayıp yaşamayacağına karar vermek için teke tek savaşlarda 13 insan şampiyona karşı dövüşecektir.
description.uk: Історія починається зі зборів богів, на яких вирішується доля людства: життя чи смерть. Погодившись з нікчемністю людського роду, боги вибирають друге... Але одна валькірія висуває пропозицію: дозволити богам і людям битися в битві, яка стане останнім променем надії для людства. 13 богів б'ються проти 13 людських чемпіонів у битвах віч-на-віч, щоб вирішити, чи буде людство жити чи згине у могутності божественної сили.
description.es-la: Los Dioses se reúnen con el objetivo de decidir si la humanidad debe vivir o morir. Y aunque llegan a la conclusión de que debe perecer, una Valkyria propone que una lucha de dioses contra humanos para tomar tan difícil decisión. Así, 13 humanos pelearán contra 13 Dioses para resolver el destino de la humanidad.
description.pt-br: A cada 1.000 anos, as divindades se reúnem sob o conselho de Valhalla para decidir sobre o direito da humanidade de continuar vivendo, ou por sua destruição, porém desta vez os deuses estão furiosos com o descaso humano para com o planeta, pendendo passim para aniquilar toda a raça humana, porém uma única valquíria os convencem de realizar o Ragnarok, uma batalha mortal entre humanos e deuses para decidir sob sua sobrevivência, 13 humanos enfrentarão 13 deuses. Serão este humanos capazes de colidir com as poderosas divindades?

description.en:
Joo Yeomin is a hardworking college student that works day and night. He's also becoming an expert at running away from the loan sharks...

'Huh... Didn't I see that person yesterday?'

One day, a suspicious man keeps showing up at Yeomin's part-time jobs.

"We know each other, right?"

"No, we don't! Why do you keep following me?"

What possibilities could come of the chase between the part-timer and the suspicious Chaebol?

Dionysus- the young boy who grew up on a small island with no memory of his family and his constant strange nightmares and dreams. One day, Dionysus decided to go on a journey to find his family and discover who he really was, alongside the love of his life, Ariadne.

**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/114158543)

L.A.G, an unknown space where humans use abilities or skills through awakening, monsters appear on each floor and room, and missions are given accordingly.

The goal here is to reach the bottom. The protagonist repeats death and life countless times in the unknown space L.A.G. However, in this life, he has the ability to own unlimited passive skills and finally has a chance to escape there.

However, unlike what he has been through so far, he will not know an inch of the future as L.A.G continues to change. This is a desperate survival story in which no one can be trusted and continues to survive the hellish L.A.G, where there is no end in sight, and fights for escape from the bottom.
description.ko:
인간이 각성을 통해 능력이나 스킬을 쓸고 있고
각 층, 방마다 몬스터들이 나오고
거기에 따른 미션이 주어지는 미지의 공간 L.A.G

이곳의 목표는 최하층에 도달하는 것이다.
그 알 수 없는 공간 L.A.G에서
수없이 죽음과 삶을 반복하고 있는 주인공.
하지만 이번 생에는 패시브 스킬을
무한으로 소유할 수 있는 능력을 갖게 되고
드디어 이곳을 탈출할 수 있는 기회가 찾아온다.

그러나 L.A.G도 지금까지 자신의 겪어왔던 것과 달리
계속 변하게 되면서 한 치 앞도 알 수 없게 된다.
그 누구도 믿을 수 없고
끝이 보이지 않는 지옥 같은 L.A.G에서
끝까지 살아남아 최하층 탈출을 위해 싸워나가는
처절한 생존 서바이벌.
description.ru: Что будет, если дать расчётливому человеку возможность бесконечно наращивать количество пассивных навыков и поставить перед ним целью выбраться из заточения, в которое он попал против своей воли? L.A.G - мистическое сооружение с огромным количеством помещений и этажей, что бесконечно тянутся вниз. Здесь люди вынуждены сражаться за свою жизнь в попытках попасть на самый нижний этаж, в котором, предположительно, они найдут все ответы. В придачу ко всему, L.A.G играет роль системы, благодаря которой игроки получают навыки и постоянно наращивают боевой потенциал. Здесь не выживает сильнейший - сильнейшим становится тот, кто выжил.
description.pt-br:
L.A.G, um local desconhecido onde humanos através de um despertar conseguem utilizar perícias e habilidades especiais e precisam concluir missões derrotando os monstros que aparecem em cada sala de cada andar.
O objetivo é alcançar o último andar do subterrâneo. O protagonista repete o ciclo de vida e morte incontáveis vezes no espaço desconhecido de L.A.G.
No entanto, desta vez, foi lhe concedido a aptidão de possuir habilidades passivas ilimitadas, e, com isso, ele usará dessa oportunidade peculiar para escapar desse inferno.

description.en:
Two siblings are roaming a post-apocalyptic world destroyed by a zombie epidemic 10 years ago. For some reason these two kids aren't getting attacked by the zombies.


(Source: Manga Mogura RE)

description.en: Tensions are brewing under the seemingly calm surface of the Vasilios Empire, a kingdom ruled by the Imperial Family and the Temple. Lady Medea Solon has lost her place next to Crown Prince Eros, but resolves to do whatever it will take to win back what's rightfully hers. Will she reclaim her throne?

Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

title.en: Go! Ina Junior High Ping-Pong Club

description.en:
There are six members of the boy's ping pong club. Two are relatively normal; however, the other four consist of an aspiring sexual deviant, two perverts, and a guy with lethal B.O. Add in a cantakerous girl as a manager, and you have the entire crew.  
  
This series pushes the boundaries of good taste beyond anything the western world has experienced, yet somehow manages to remain vaguely charming. The antics of the ping pong club includes one member's trademark "Protruding Pecker Serve," molesting cross-dressing members, and the infamous "Turtle Sequence," which is much too horrifying to describe.  
  
In 1996, this manga won the Kodansha Manga Award for general manga.
